heading: Toyota Corolla XLi Automatic 2025 Price in Pakistan, Specs & Features
rich_price_paragraph: The price of Toyota Corolla XLi Automatic in Pakistan is PKR 1,330,000. This price of Corolla XLi Automatic is ex-factory and does not include freight, taxes and other documentation charges.

price_block.h2: Toyota Corolla XLi Automatic Price in Pakistan
